function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Promotion of reusable masks may lead to improper maintenance and cleaning, increasing the risk of disease transmission","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mandatory mask wearing creating high demand","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global supply chain vulnerabilities","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise of counterfeit products","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High demand and production volume may lead to insufficient monitoring of hygiene and cleanliness in the production process, increasing the risk of contamination and spread of contagious diseases through the shoes","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Haze particles can affect the heart and lungs, especially in people with chronic heart or lung disease","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Worsening air quality leading to high demand for n95 masks","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Production and distribution of face masks during a contagious disease outbreak","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Air pollution and its impact on public health","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of face masks as a result of air quality concerns and the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging new behaviors through government policies","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in online retailing due to social distancing measures and fear of infection","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of long-term human resource strategies","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased exposure to contagious diseases due to working with larger crowds and handling returned items.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perception of low social status and lack of glamour in retail work, exacerbated by pandemic-related challenges.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low wages leading to irregular working hours and minimal qualifications","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shift towards online shopping highlights the need for strong customer service and online presence","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Panic buying due to the increase in covid-19 cases","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exacerbation of disruptions due to government measures like social distancing","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adoption of technologies and online shopping due to evolving pandemic situation","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in the hospitality industry","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for online retail operations","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards online shopping and cashless transactions","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Primary agricultural producers unable to sell produce due to movement control orders and travel restrictions.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surge in demand for online grocery shopping leading to unprepared online retailers and insufficient delivery capacity.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global panic buying, food protectionism, and lockdowns","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to essential goods for vulnerable populations","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strain on the profitability of smaller retailers","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Panic buying leading to long queues and abandoned groceries","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Elderly shoppers still going to crowded places","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Panic buying leading to shortage of essential goods","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of the virus through large-scale events and religious gatherings","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic spread across the world","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on service industry, including travel and tourism","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promoting the idea of solidarity and collective action","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance to collective action in the citizenry","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential liability for conduct related to discrimination or harassment","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of empowerment and support for on-the-ground teams to find solutions for crisis management.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of empathy and understanding from leaders towards employees' work-life balance concerns","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential breach of confidential medical information and biased decision-making based on medical conditions may lead to legal and ethical implications.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prioritizing higher-level employee needs without adequately addressing physiological, safety, and social needs may lead to decreased employee well-being and performance.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial hardship for employees and business partners","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Temporary resort closure leading to financial strain on employees and potential economic impact on the local community.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Talent turnover costs the business in both money and time.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance with legal and regulatory requirements","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unplanned response to the pandemic impact on the organization","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contested governance structures and plural leadership","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Breakdown of support structures for vulnerable groups","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of predefined protocols for vulnerability in epidemic response","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mismanagement of deceased individuals leading to tension and resistance among local populations","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"}]}
